dict.string: This is the world famous Trillium Poster in electronic format. Brought to you by Radisys, it serves as an evolving tool while underscoring Radisys' depth and breadth of communications expertise. The Trillium Poster illustrates standards-based nodes, interfaces and protocol stacks for a variety of technology architectures.

About Us

Radisys (NASDAQ: RSYS) is a leading provider of embedded wireless infrastructure solutions for telecom, aerospace, defense and public safety applications. Radisys' market-leading ATCA, IP Media Server and COM Express platforms coupled with world-renowned Trillium software, services and market expertise enable customers to bring high-value products and services to market faster with lower investment and risk.

Radisys solutions are used in a wide variety of 3G & 4G/LTE mobile network applications including: Radio Access Networks (RAN) solutions from femtocells to picocells and macrocells, wireless core network applications, Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) and policy management; conferencing and media services including voice, video and data, as well as customized mobile network applications that support the aerospace, defense and public safety markets.

Order the Trillium Poster

Want to order the Trillium Poster in print form? Click here to order the 6th generation of this popular communications network infrastructure wall chart today.

Help

How to navigate the electronic Trillium Poster:

  • Select a network
    From the main landing page, tap on a button to learn more about a specific network architecture
  • Learn about network elements
    Tap on any network element to learn more technical details and take advantage of Radisys resources
  • Move about within the app
    To navigate to a different network architecture, simply tap on the Home button to travel back to the main landing page and repeat Step 1 above. OR, click on one of the arrows at the edge of a network page to explore the other featured architectures
  • Contact Radisys
    If at any point you would like more information on Radisysâ€™ solutions or expertise, simply click on the Contact button to find the appropriate contact information. Have questions about using this app? Need to report an issue? Please fill out this form and the Radisys help desk will quickly address the problem.
